channel.title: Fixing duping methods?
channel.description: I made a server and i found out that their are easy ways to spawn/dupe on it. Could someone please help me in fixing these?

item.title: Fixing duping methods?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Djs015:

ahh my bad haha its the cheat engine dupe. Say a rune and adamant defender were in a shop. What you do is you search the code for rune defender in cheat engine ( 8850 ) and then after that you enter the code for addy defender (8849) and click next search while holding the mouse over the adamant defender in the shop. Next, you highlight all the addresses that come up and click the red arrow. Then you freeze the addresses and change the second to last ones value to whatever item you want. Then buy the item from the shop. Any way to fix haha?

Cheat engines donâ€™t actually take effect after you move do they?

Read full topic
